title: Are We Becoming a Cashless Society? (Hour 2)
description:
Dave Ramsey & Dr. John Delony discuss:

Dealing with a gambling addict father,

Rumors of the US going to a fully cashless society,

Not being on the same page as your spouse (about the thermostat).


Support Our Sponsor:

PODS Moving & Storage

Christian Healthcare Ministries
